entry.title: 'demo01'
entry.content:
下载日志采集filebeat

wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/beats/filebeat/filebeat-7.3.1-x86_64.rpm

安装filebeat

sudo rpm -ivh filebeat-7.3.1-x86_64.rpm

编辑配置

1、执行命令，清空filebeat默认配置

echo "">/etc/filebeat/filebeat.yml

2、编辑/etc/filebeat/filebeat.yml文件，添加以下配置信息：

<log_config_detail>

启动filebeat

service filebeat start
package com.unidata.cloud.logservice;import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;import org.springframework.boot.context.properties.EnableConfigurationProperties;/** * 应用主类 * * @author kangjia@unicloud.com * @date 2019/10/14 16:37 */@SpringBootApplication@EnableConfigurationPropertiespublic class LogServiceApplication {    /**     * 应用主类     *     * @param args args     * @author kangjia     */    public static void main(String[] args) {        SpringApplication.run(LogServiceApplication.class, args);    }}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
